body_html: @asimshankar : Thanks for your quick reply. I started working with scope as opposed to working directly with graphs and finding the workflow better. Yes, subscope solves the namespace issue, I also don't have to name every operation and error management is so much easier, i.e., basically catch error at scope finalize step.

body: @asimshankar : Thanks for your quick reply. I started working with scope as opposed to working directly with graphs and finding the workflow better. Yes, subscope solves the namespace issue, I also don't have to name every operation and error management is so much easier, i.e., basically catch error at scope finalize step.
